ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 22
ygData.msgSnippet: Please, I beg you for the second time, trim your replies. In case you don t know, many of us have to scroll down through the three pages of stuff (which we ve
ygData.messageBody:
Please, I beg you for the second time, trim your replies.

In case you don't know, many of us have to scroll down through the three
pages of stuff (which we've already read in the original message) you leave
after your one line or paragraph in order to get to the next post.

I've voted for the list to be moderated just in the hopes of cutting this
down. If that doesn't do it, I'll have to drop the list. It's just too
annoying.

Satyric
